abstract: LivingSocial issued $142.9 million in shares as part of its acquisition of the South Korean daily deal site TicketMonster, according to a person with knowledge of the deal. In a filing released on Friday, the company disclosed its offering was related to a "business combination." TechCrunch earlier reported news of the transaction.

headline.main: LivingSocial Issues $143 Million in Shares for TicketMonster
